questions.question: Is it safe to upload my images?
questions.answer: → Yes, all processing happens on our secure server. Images are automatically deleted after 1 hour.

questions.question: Is there a usage limit?
questions.answer: → Up to 20 images per batch, unlimited batches. For larger volumes, check our enterprise API.

questions.question: Will I lose quality when compressing?
questions.answer: → Quality loss is minimal and imperceptible to the human eye at 80-90% settings. We optimize for web while maintaining visual quality.
